name: shex

body.origin:
|- wcel(csh, universe)
-| wcel(cpw(chba), universe)
-| wss(csh, cpw(chba))
body.pretty:
⊢ SH ∈ 𝕌
⊣ P(~H)∈ 𝕌
⊣ SH ⊆ P(~H)

cumulated.origin:

-| wss(csh, cpw(chba))
-| wcel(chba, universe)

body.origin:
|- wss(csh, cpw(chba))
-| wi(wcel(cv(hs0), csh), wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(chba)))
-| diffsc(hs0, csh)
-| diffsc(hs0, cpw(chba))
body.pretty:
⊢ SH ⊆ P(~H)
⊣ (hs0 ∈ SH → hs0 ∈ P(~H))
⊣ d(hs0, SH)
⊣ d(hs0, P(~H))

stmt.origin: sylibr(wcel(cv(hs0), csh), wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(chba)), wss(cv(hs0), chba))

body.origin:

⊣ (hs0 ∈ SH → hs0 ⊆ ~H)
⊣ (hs0 ∈ P(~H)↔ hs0 ⊆ ~H)
